This package uses and overrides eea.facetednavigation functionality
===================================================================

Set up
------

    >>> self.loginAsPortalOwner()
    >>> from Products.CMFCore.utils import getToolByName
    >>> rtool = getToolByName(portal, 'portal_relations')

  Add Content-Type

    >>> name = rtool.invokeFactory('EEARelationsContentType', 'myFolder')
    >>> ctype = rtool[name]
    >>> ctype.processForm(values={
    ...   'title': 'My Folder',
    ...   'ct_type': 'Folder',
    ...   'ct_interface': 'eea.relations.interfaces.INode',
    ... })
    >>> request = ctype.REQUEST

Default faceted widgets
-----------------------

    >>> from zope.component import getMultiAdapter
    >>> widgets = getMultiAdapter((ctype, request), name=u'default_widgets.xml')
    >>> print widgets()
